EP and Claim Label for BDD-Excluded Claims Received Electronically With Less Than  90 Days Remaining on Active Duty
BDD-excluded claims filed electronically will be automatically established by VA electronic claims processing systems using a rating EP of 010, 110, or 020 and associated claim label
for service members with less than 90 days remaining on active duty.
References
:  For more information on
processing of claims excluded from the BDD program, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6,B.1.c
, and
determining the appropriate rating EP, see
M21-4, Appendix B
.
